entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1700 metres in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
